response.overview: Famous Studios Superman Volume Three 3D  The thrilling final chapter of the Max Fleischer/Famous Studios Superman cartoons has finally landed in this brand new 3D conversion!  ​  Episodes include:  Showdown (1942)  Destruction, Inc. (1942)  The Mummy Strikes (1943)  The Underground World (1943)  Secret Agent (1943)  ​​  In addition to these five incredible classic episodes the disc includes trailers and previews for EYEPOP-3D and Plan D titles in glorious 3D.  All five episodes and previews are in digital frame packed 3D (requires 3D Blu-ray player and 3D TV or Projector).
response.title: Max Fleischer Superman Volume Three 3D
